title: Problems with ringtone volume on Pixel 3. Way too low even when set at Max volume. Is there a fix?
content: Ringtone volume too low. Have downloaded various loud ringtones, however all too low even when set at max volume. Is Google going to fix this issue. Just got this phone but if I can't hear phone when it rings and no fix is in works, I'll be returning it. Big disappointment!
